distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for umoci fixes the following issues:

- Update to umoci v0.4.6.
- CVE-2021-29136: malicious layer allows overwriting of host files (bsc#1184147)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: Open Container Initiative umoci before 0.4.7 allows attackers to overwrite arbitrary host paths via a crafted image that causes symlink traversal when "umoci unpack" or "umoci raw unpack" is used.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
